code: import axios from'axios';const API_URI='http://localhost:8000';const API_MAILFLOW=async function(serviceUrlObject){let requestData=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:{};let type=arguments.length>2?arguments[2]:undefined;const{}=requestData;return await axios({method:serviceUrlObject.method,url:"".concat(API_URI,"/").concat(serviceUrlObject.endpoint),data:requestData});};export default API_MAILFLOW;
